about_the_game:
Nightmariners is a co-op sailing-horror game. Deliver cargo between islands while avoiding sinister creatures.

Set sail into the abyss with Nightmariners, a cooperative sailing-horror adventure where survival hinges on teamwork and wit. As a crew of daring mariners, your mission is to transport critical cargo across a dark and treacherous ocean—but the waters are far from empty.

Navigate through a haunting expanse teeming with lurking terrors, colossal sea creatures, and otherworldly phenomena. Each journey between islands tests your resolve, as threats emerge from the deep, threatening to tear your ship—and your sanity—apart.

Key Features:

  • Co-op Survival Gameplay: Work together with up to three friends, managing your ship's navigation, maintenance, and defenses. Every role counts as you face challenges both above and below the waves.

  • Dynamic Sea Encounters: Prepare for unpredictable dangers. From monstrous leviathans to supernatural storms, the ocean is alive with threats that will push your crew to their limits.

  • Resource Management: Keep your ship afloat and operational by balancing limited resources like fuel, coal, and repairs. Choices can mean the difference between survival and doom.

  • Eerie Island Exploration: Dock at desolate islands to scavenge supplies, repair your vessel, and uncover the dark secrets of the maritime world.

  • Immersive Atmosphere: Experience a haunting blend of suspenseful soundscapes, dynamic lighting, and procedurally generated dangers that make each voyage unique.

In Nightmariners, the sea is vast, the stakes are high, and the horrors are relentless. Will you and your crew brave the unknown, or will the ocean claim you as its own?
